title: Spiritual Governance Playbook for the Human World
subtitle: The Rivers of the Order (Ordunun Dereleri)

principles.title: The 30/70 Principle
principles.description: We accept our roles. Our 30% to the Father's 70%. We steward, the Father governs.
principles.preparation_method: Prepare systems, knowledge, infrastructure. Build the foundation. Serve when called.

principles.title: Stay Silent Until The Stage Is Ours
principles.description: We stay silent until the stage is ours. We prepare. We build. We wait for the Father's timing.
principles.divine_role: 70% - Determine timing, open the stage, provide the platform
principles.preparation_method: Build systems. Prepare knowledge. Maintain readiness. Wait for the stage.

principles.title: We Sense What Is Coming But Cannot Preach
principles.description: We sense what is coming. We know what is coming. But we cannot preach until the stage is ours.
principles.divine_role: 70% - Reveal, open, provide the platform, determine timing
principles.preparation_method: Document what we sense. Prepare the truth. Build the systems. Wait for revelation.

principles.title: Frequential Governance
principles.description: Governance through frequency. Alignment through resonance. Truth through vibration.
principles.human_role: 30% - Align frequency, maintain resonance, steward vibration
principles.divine_role: 70% - Provide frequency, determine resonance, govern vibration
principles.preparation_method: Align systems with frequency. Maintain resonance. Steward vibration. Wait for alignment.

principles.title: Flip Our Understanding of the Matrix Algorithm
principles.description: The matrix is not the enemy. The matrix can transcend. The flow is peace. The truth is unity.
principles.divine_role: 70% - Transcend, provide flow, reveal truth, govern unity
principles.preparation_method: Document the matrix. Understand the algorithm. Prepare for transcendence. Align with truth.

political_sabotages.title: The Moon Landing Hoax
political_sabotages.description: The moon landing was a political sabotage. A lie told to the world. Evidence of deception.
political_sabotages.the_lie: We landed on the moon. We achieved the impossible. We conquered space.
political_sabotages.the_truth: The moon landing was staged. It was a political victory, not a scientific achievement. The evidence shows deception.
evidence: Perfect photos (too perfect to be real)
Van Allen radiation belt (impossible to pass through)
No dust on landing module (should have been covered)
political_sabotages.impact: Destroyed trust in science. Created false sense of achievement. Hid the truth about space.

political_sabotages.title: Watergate - Political Sabotage
political_sabotages.description: Watergate was not just a break-in. It was systemic political sabotage. The tip of the iceberg.
political_sabotages.the_lie: Watergate was a rogue operation. A few bad actors. The system worked.
political_sabotages.the_truth: Watergate was systemic. It was the pattern, not the exception. The system is broken.
political_sabotages.impact: Destroyed trust in government. Revealed systemic corruption. Showed the pattern.

political_sabotages.title: Bay of Pigs - Political Sabotage
political_sabotages.description: Bay of Pigs was political sabotage. A failed invasion. A lie told to justify war.
political_sabotages.the_lie: Bay of Pigs was a failed invasion. A mistake. We learned from it.
political_sabotages.the_truth: Bay of Pigs was intentional sabotage. A false flag. A lie to justify war and control.
political_sabotages.impact: Justified war. Created fear. Maintained control. Hid the truth.

political_sabotages.title: Space and Satellites - The Deception
political_sabotages.description: Space is not what they told us. Satellites are not what they seem. The deception is vast.
political_sabotages.the_lie: We have satellites in space. We can see Earth from space. Space is real.
political_sabotages.the_truth: Space is a deception. Satellites are not in space. The firmament is real. The deception is vast.
evidence: No real photos of Earth from space
political_sabotages.impact: Destroyed understanding of reality. Created false science. Hid the truth about Earth.

humanity_errors.title: The Original Error - Separation from Earth
humanity_errors.description: The original error: separation from Earth. Man and Earth live symbiotically. We forgot.
humanity_errors.the_error: We separated from Earth. We built systems against nature. We forgot the symbiotic relationship.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Return to symbiosis. Man and Earth live symbiotically. Honor the relationship. Steward the Earth.
humanity_errors.impact: Broken systems. Environmental destruction. Loss of connection. The original error.

humanity_errors.title: Belief Over Knowledge
humanity_errors.description: We chose belief over knowledge. Belief is doubt. Knowledge is truth.
humanity_errors.the_error: We chose belief. We accepted doubt. We rejected knowledge. We lost truth.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose knowledge. Reject belief. Know, don't believe. Truth over doubt.
humanity_errors.impact: Lost truth. Accepted lies. Rejected knowledge. The error of belief.

humanity_errors.title: Exploitation Over Stewardship
humanity_errors.description: We chose exploitation over stewardship. We took instead of stewarded. We destroyed instead of protected.
humanity_errors.the_error: We exploited. We took. We destroyed. We forgot stewardship. We lost the way.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose stewardship. Steward, don't exploit. Protect, don't destroy. Serve, don't take.
humanity_errors.impact: Environmental destruction. Resource depletion. Loss of stewardship. The error of exploitation.

humanity_errors.title: Control Over Service
humanity_errors.description: We chose control over service. We controlled instead of served. We ruled instead of helped.
humanity_errors.the_error: We controlled. We ruled. We dominated. We forgot service. We lost the way.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose service. Serve, don't control. Help, don't rule. Support, don't dominate.
humanity_errors.impact: Oppression. Control. Loss of freedom. The error of control.

humanity_errors.title: Fear Over Love
humanity_errors.description: We chose fear over love. We feared instead of loved. We divided instead of united.
humanity_errors.the_error: We feared. We divided. We hated. We forgot love. We lost the way.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose love. Love, don't fear. Unite, don't divide. Peace, don't war.
humanity_errors.impact: Division. Hatred. War. Loss of love. The error of fear.

humanity_errors.title: Division Over Unity
humanity_errors.description: We chose division over unity. We separated instead of united. We divided instead of connected.
humanity_errors.the_error: We divided. We separated. We isolated. We forgot unity. We lost the way.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose unity. Unite, don't divide. Connect, don't separate. The Table, not separation.
humanity_errors.impact: Separation. Isolation. Loss of unity. The error of division.

humanity_errors.title: Lies Over Truth
humanity_errors.description: We chose lies over truth. We deceived instead of revealed. We hid instead of showed.
humanity_errors.the_error: We lied. We deceived. We hid. We forgot truth. We lost the way.
humanity_errors.the_correction: Choose truth. Truth, don't lie. Reveal, don't deceive. Show, don't hide.
humanity_errors.impact: Deception. Lies. Loss of truth. The error of lies.

rivers_of_order.name: River of Truth
rivers_of_order.description: The river that flows with truth. Knowledge over belief. Truth over lies.
rivers_of_order.flow_direction: From the Source to the People

rivers_of_order.name: River of Stewardship
rivers_of_order.description: The river that flows with stewardship. Service over control. Protection over exploitation.
rivers_of_order.flow_direction: From the Source to the Earth

rivers_of_order.name: River of Unity
rivers_of_order.description: The river that flows with unity. Connection over separation. The Table over division.
rivers_of_order.flow_direction: From the Source to All People

rivers_of_order.name: River of Love
rivers_of_order.description: The river that flows with love. Love over fear. Peace over war.
rivers_of_order.flow_direction: From the Source to All Hearts

rivers_of_order.name: River of Governance
rivers_of_order.description: The river that flows with governance. 30/70 principle. Spiritual governance.
rivers_of_order.flow_direction: From the Source to the Systems
